verses.verse: <S%H2142>Remember<s%> also your <S%H1254>Creator<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H979>youth,<s%> <S%H5704>before<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> and the <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H5060>draw<s%> <S%H5060>near<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> you will <S%H559>say,<s%> "I <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2656>delight<s%> in them";

<S%H5704>before<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> the <S%H216>light,<s%> the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars<s%> are <S%H2821>darkened,<s%> and <S%H5645>clouds<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1653>rain;<s%>

in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2111>tremble,<s%> and <S%H2428>mighty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5791>stoop,<s%> the <S%H2912>grinding<s%> ones <S%H988>stand<s%> <S%H988>idle<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H4591>few,<s%> and those who <S%H7200>look<s%> through <S%H699>windows<s%> <S%H2821>grow<s%> <S%H2821>dim;<s%>

and the <S%H1817>doors<s%> on the <S%H7784>street<s%> are <S%H5462>shut<s%> as the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H2913>grinding<s%> <S%H2913>mill<s%> is <S%H8217>low,<s%> and one will <S%H6965>arise<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H6833>bird,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7892>song<s%> will <S%H7817>sing<s%> <S%H7817>softly.<s%>

<S%H1571>Furthermore,<s%> men are <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of a <S%H1364>high<s%> place and of <S%H2849>terrors<s%> on the <S%H1870>road;<s%> the <S%H8247>almond<s%> <S%H8247>tree<s%> <S%H9343>blossoms,<s%> the <S%H2284>grasshopper<s%> <S%H5445>drags<s%> himself along, and the <S%H35>caperberry<s%> is <S%H6565>ineffective.<s%> For <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1980>goes<s%> to his <S%H5769>eternal<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> while <S%H5594>mourners<s%> <S%H5437>go<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> in the <S%H7784>street.<s%>

[Remember Him] <S%H5704>before<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H9112>cord<s%> is <S%H7576>broken<s%> and the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H1543>bowl<s%> is <S%H7533>crushed,<s%> the <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> by the <S%H4002>well<s%> is <S%H7665>shattered<s%> and the <S%H1534>wheel<s%> at the <S%H953>cistern<s%> is <S%H7533>crushed;<s%>
then the <S%H6083>dust<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> as it was, and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it.

In <S%H3148>addition<s%> to <S%H1961>being<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man,<s%> the <S%H6953>Preacher<s%> <S%H5750>also<s%> <S%H3925>taught<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%> and he <S%H239>pondered,<s%> <S%H2713>searched<s%> out and <S%H8626>arranged<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H4912>proverbs.<s%>

The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>men<s%> are like <S%H9091>goads,<s%> and <S%H1167>masters<s%> of [these] <S%H627>collections<s%> are like well-driven <S%H4548>nails;<s%> they are <S%H5414>given<s%> by <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7462>Shepherd.<s%>

But <S%H3148>beyond<s%> <S%H1992>this,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> be <S%H2094>warned:<s%> the <S%H6213>writing<s%> of <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H5612>books<s%> is <S%H7093>endless,<s%> <S%H369><s%> and <S%H3854>excessive<s%> <S%H3854>devotion<s%> [to books] is <S%H3024>wearying<s%> to the <S%H1320>body.<s%>

The <S%H5490>conclusion,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> when <S%H3605>all<s%> has been <S%H8085>heard,<s%> [is: ] <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> [applies to] <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>person.<s%>

For God will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4639>act<s%> to <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> which is <S%H5956>hidden,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> it is <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
